TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is made in the laboratory and stimulates the bone marrow to make red blood cells. It is a type of antianemic and a type of recombinant human erythropoietin.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia elaborada en el laboratorio que estimula la médula ósea para que produzca glóbulos rojos. Es un tipo de antianémico y de eritropoyetina humana recombinante.
